Comment:
the Fegatello or Fried Liever attack 
Alternative variation: 6. d4 [(Lolly Attack) is prefered by Harding and Pinski.] 6... exd4 [btw: Morphy used another move order: 1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Bc4 Nf6 4.d4 exd4 5.Ng5 d5 6.exd5 Nxd5] 7. O-O Be7 8. Nxf7 [Houdinin evaluates +- (+2.02)] 8... Kxf7 9. Qf3+ Ke6 [?] 10. Nc3 (10. Re1+ [!] 10... Ne5 11. Bf4 Bf6 12. Nc3 c6 13. Rxe5+ Bxe5 14. Re1 [etc etc. Black has no change as all White pieces are involved in the attack])10... dxc3 11. Re1+ Ne5 12. Bf4 Bf6 13. Bxe5 Bxe5 14. Rxe5+ Kxe5 15. Re1+ Kd4 16. Bxd5 Re8 (16... Qxd5 17. Qxc3#)17. Qd3+ Kc5 18. b4+ Kxb4 19. Qd4+ Ka5 20. Qxc3+ Ka4 21. Qb3+ Ka5 22. Qa3+ Kb6 23. Rb1# [1-0, Paul Morphy - NN, New Orleans -]
